text:
Champions League
Real Madrid - Galatasaray: what time on which TV channel?
Second in group A, Real Madrid has the opportunity to get closer to the qualification in case of victory against Galatasaray on behalf of the fourth day of the Champions League. Find out which channel and what time to see the meeting.
06 Nov 2019, 04:00 by Antoine Chirat



Eden HazardClub previous: ChelseaCompensation: 100 million eurosIcon Sport



Luka JovicClub previous: Eintracht FrankfurtIndemnity: 60 million eurosIcon Sport



Eder Militao Previous club: FC PortoCompensation: 50 million eurosIcon Sport



Ferland MendyClub previous: Olympique LyonnaisIndemnity: 48 million eurosIcon Sport



RodrygoClub previous: SantosCompensation: 45 million eurosIcon Sport



Alphonse AreolaClub previous: Paris Saint-GermainIndemnity: none (ready) Icon Sport



Takefusa KuboClub previous: FC TokyoIndemnity: noneIcon Sport

Real Madrid: all the recruits of the transfer window 2019




The Champions League is making a big comeback and Real Madrid are receiving on behalf of the fourth day of group A the Turks of Galatasaray. In the first leg, Zinedine Zidane's men struggled hard on the Bosphorus 1-0 thanks to a goal from Toni Kroos. In Santiago Bernabeu, the Madrilenians have the opportunity to get closer to a qualification in case of victory on their lawn.







Real Madrid - Galatasaray on TV




Zinedine Zidane, Real Madrid coach + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

This Group A match of the fourth day of the Champions League between Galatasaray and Real Madrid is to be followed live on French television this Wednesday, November 6, 2019 from 21 hours, French time, on the RMC Sport 2 channel.
The results and schedule of group A




Sergio Ramos + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

9 pm: Galatasaray 0-1 PSG

3rd day - 22nd of October:

9 pm: Club Bruges 0-5 PSG
9 pm: Galatasaray 0-1 Real Madrid

4th day - November 6th:

9 pm: Real Madrid - Galatasaray
9 pm: PSG - Club Brugge

5th day - November 26th:

18h55: Galatasaray - Club Brugge
9 pm: Real Madrid - PSG

6th day - December 11th:

9 pm: Club Brugge - Real Madrid
9 pm: PSG - Galatasaray
